column1: Project Titan involves real-time quality control using machine vision on Yaskawa robot arms.
The internal IP address of the Siemens PLC in Lab 3 is 192.168.0.55.
Alice calibrated the temperature sensor in Lab 2 on March 18, 2024.
The oscilloscope in Lab 1 is labeled RIGOL DS1054Z and stored in the far-left cabinet.
COSMO stands for Center Operations Smart Monitoring Operator.
The main use case for MQTT in our lab is edge-to-cloud communication for sensor networks.
